M

main(String[]) - Static method in class org.hrw.Main
Starts the application by: loading configuration values from config.properties initializing the user interface creating system components on confirmation (collector, hasher, database handler, scheduler, blockchain anchor) starting the embedded database API enabling scheduling controls in the UI

Processor - Class in org.hrw.application
Coordinates the complete processing workflow: Fetches raw server telemetry data via Collector Hashes the collected data and builds Merkle-related structures via Hasher Persists both raw and hashed data via DatabaseHandler Anchors the calculated hash data in the blockchain using AnchorService
Processor(Processor.ProcessorBuilder) - Constructor for class org.hrw.application.Processor
 
Processor.ProcessorBuilder - Class in org.hrw.application
Builder for constructing Processor instances.
ProcessorBuilder() - Constructor for class org.hrw.application.Processor.ProcessorBuilder
 

R

readFromDatabase(long, long, String) - Method in class org.hrw.infrastructure.database.DatabaseHandler
Reads server data from the given table between the specified timestamp range.
run() - Method in class org.hrw.application.Processor
Executes the full processing pipeline: Logs the start time Fetches raw server data Hashes the data Writes both raw and hashed data to the database Anchors the hashed values in the blockchain Logs the completion time
